RC_ELIGIBLE.label: Eligible
RC_ELIGIBLE.description: All mandatory checks passed for the evaluated rulebook version.

RC_ADDRESS_MISMATCH.label: Address mismatch
RC_ADDRESS_MISMATCH.description: The address facts evaluated did not match the service requirement.
RC_ADDRESS_MISMATCH.remedy_hint: Verify the address registry entry and submit a correction request if needed.

RC_PRIORITY_ASSIGNED.label: Priority assigned
RC_PRIORITY_ASSIGNED.description: A priority category or rank was assigned based on the rulebook.
RC_PRIORITY_ASSIGNED.remedy_hint: If incorrect, file an appeal with supporting evidence.
